books.author: by Eben Alexander
books.description: A neurosurgeon recounts his near death experience during a coma from bacterial meningitis.
books.name: PROOF OF HEAVEN

books.author: by Chris Kyle with Scott McEwen and Jim DeFelice
books.description: A member of the Navy SEALs, recently shot to death in Texas, discusses his battlefield experiences.
books.name: AMERICAN SNIPER

books.author: by Pat Head Summitt with Sally Jenkins
books.description: A memoir by the longtime coach of the University of Tennessee Lady Vols, who received a diagnosis of early onset Alzheimer’s disease.
books.name: SUM IT UP

books.author: by Ben C. Carson and Candy Carson
books.description: A doctor explores what makes America great.
books.name: AMERICA THE BEAUTIFUL

books.author: by Bill O'Reilly and Martin Dugard
books.description: The host of “The O’Reilly Factor” recounts the assassination of John F. Kennedy.
books.name: KILLING KENNEDY

books.author: by Michael Moss
books.description: A New York Times reporter reveals how food companies encourage us to consume more of their products.
books.name: SALT SUGAR FAT

books.author: by Susan Cain
books.description: Introverts — one-third of the population — are undervalued in American society.
books.name: QUIET

books.author: by Sonia Sotomayor
books.description: The Supreme Court justice recalls growing up in the Bronx and other aspects of her early life.
books.name: MY BELOVED WORLD

books.author: by Bill O'Reilly and Martin Dugard
books.description: The host of “The O’Reilly Factor” recounts the assassination of Abraham Lincoln.
books.name: KILLING LINCOLN

books.author: by Brandi Glanville with Leslie Bruce
books.description: One of the “Real Housewives of Beverly Hills” describes her adventures.
books.name: DRINKING AND TWEETING

books.author: by Mark Owen with Kevin Maurer
books.description: An account of the mission that killed Osama bin Laden, by a former member of the Navy SEALs.
books.name: NO EASY DAY

books.author: by Laura Hillenbrand
books.description: An Olympic runner’s story of survival as a prisoner of the Japanese in World War II.
books.name: UNBROKEN

books.author: by Cheryl Strayed
books.description: A woman’s account of a life-changing 1,100-mile hike along the Pacific Crest Trail.
books.name: WILD

books.author: by Clive Davis with Anthony DeCurtis
books.description: The music industry executive’s memoir offers an insider’s look at the last 50 years of popular music.
books.name: SOUNDTRACK OF MY LIFE

books.author: by Tina Fey
books.description: A memoir from the former "Saturday Night Live" star and creator of "30 Rock."
books.name: BOSSYPANTS
